Judul: AN ANALYSIS OF FORECASTED PROFIT YEARS 2010-2014 IN PETROLEUM INDUSTRY IN INDONESIA
Abstrak: Petroleum industry is the biggest economy vectors now. None could defeat. The big money stays around this industry. High paid technicians are their assets. The biggest polution is coming from this industry. Due to those reasons, author try to trace back how much the important of this business for the company. Author wants to calculate, using linear regression analysis, to find out how much forecasted profit in next five years, 2010-2014. Author break down into three puzzles. The first one is cost structure derived from FQR given by BP Migas officially. This list summarize all important numbers needed to define how much percentage the fixed and variable part in, definitely all mixed costs. The production is given too, in that list. Linear regression is the best way to describe price movement along 30 years to find the 'b', incremental change over the time. Thus plug the constanta as 'a'. Finally profit is the process of revenue, production volume times price, deduct by expense or total cost.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Pembimbing: Ir.Drs.H. Arson Aliludin, SE, DEA.
Kata Kunci: Regression Analysis, Cost, Production, Price, Profit
